name: Hardcore Cactus Simulator
description:
Do u like cactus?

Do u feel like a cactus?

Do u feel like this world is too kind?

Get into the world of cactus farming.

It will solve at least 0 of your problems (3/3 game devs agree).

Created for Low Effort Jam 6.

Code and Art: Berriis, Altheflyer, and Kervina

Title: flamingtext.com
